item.description:
Hi All-
I want to test drive a new park in East Cambridge-my Sis lives around the corner and loves it. If you know Twin City Plaza on the Somerville/Cambridge line you can park there and walk over. Lot's of small dogs and friendly people. Off leash and pretty safe.
Here is the reviews on Yelp:
http://www.yelp.com/b...

So I figure it's so crazy in town this is the perfect weekend with weather etc to try out a new venue.
If you can make it GREAT if not we hope to see you next week.

No dues this week as it's a bit on the selfish side since I want my new frenchie to get out and about with other dogs. Just gotta get the puppy energy out! Oh, and my sis's puggle will be there-totally fun dog!

Just casual.
thanks
terri, Simon & Louie
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the biggest Frenchie (Simon) and you'll find us.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Last minute meetup at Gold Star Mother's Park
